availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Campbell County, Kentucky, attorney. Attorney in Campbell County from 1860 to 1865. Private in Company D, 1st Battalion, 42nd Enrolled Militia from September 2, 1862 to September 27, 1862.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Campbell, Newport, p. 203. U.S. City Directories, 1822-1995, Oliver W Root, 1866, swc York and Taylor. Find A Grave, “Oliver W. Root (October 3, 1835-August 3, 1904),” Memorial #89535928, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=89535928 (accessed June 5, 2017).
